segments.text: I feel disgusted by how messy and chaotic this kitchen is right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the woman is just ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and it’s just gross how they’re behaving.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand seeing the water spreading across the floor like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still just polishing that plate, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to make everything worse, and no one is stopping them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sick just watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is absolutely revolting to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
